description: Semi realism is a tattoo style that seeks to combine realistic and stylized depictions of a living being or scene. The balance between realism and abstraction allows for an interpretation of the subject that can sometimes be quite dramatic, as well as being used in more subtle ways.
name: Semi Realism Tattoos
